readonly.description: This property designates a property to be readonly when set to true.

specification.description: This attribute contains normative language relating to the Redfish Sprecification and documentation.

copyright.description: This attribute contains the copyright notice for the schema.

enumDescriptions.description: This attribute contains informative language related to the enumeration values of the property.

correlatableID.description: This attribute indicates that the property is a correlatable ID as defined in the Redfish Specification.
